targets.expr: clamp_max(avg by (service_name) ((rate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_flow_control_paused_ns{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) or irate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_flow_control_paused_ns{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])))/1000000000 * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}),1)

(avg by (service_name) (rate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_flow_control_sent{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) or irate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_flow_control_sent{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]))) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) ((rate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_received_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) or irate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_received_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]))) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) ((rate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_replicated_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) or irate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_replicated_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]))) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) (mysql_global_status_wsrep_local_recv_queue{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) (mysql_global_status_wsrep_local_send_queue{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) ((rate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_received{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) or irate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_received{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]))) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) ((rate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_replicated{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) or irate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_replicated{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]))) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) ((rate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_received_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) / (rate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_received{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) > 0) or irate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_received_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]) / (irate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_received{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]) > 0))) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) ((rate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_replicated_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) / (rate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_replicated{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval]) > 0) or irate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_replicated_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]) / (irate(mysql_global_status_wsrep_replicated{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]) > 0))) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) (mysql_global_status_wsrep_flow_control_interval_low{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) (mysql_global_status_wsrep_flow_control_interval_high{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) (mysql_global_status_wsrep_ist_receive_seqno_start{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) (mysql_global_status_wsrep_ist_receive_seqno_current{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) (mysql_global_status_wsrep_ist_receive_seqno_end{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) (avg_over_time(mysql_galera_evs_repl_latency_avg_seconds{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})

avg by (service_name) (max_over_time(mysql_galera_evs_repl_latency_max_seconds{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])) * on (service_name) group_left avg by (service_name) (mysql_galera_variables_info{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace"})
